ygData.subject: RE: Crafted items (some idiot)
ygData.msgSnippet: Yes, both are from the Knight. I have heard that the tunic is about 1 out of 10 kills. The level ranges sound about right, if you have a cleric or two you can
ygData.messageBody:
Yes, both are from the Knight. I have heard that the
tunic is about 1 out of 10 kills.

The level ranges sound about right, if you have a
cleric or two you can get by with a little lower. If I
recall, he does use harm touch for about 300 hits, so
be prepared for that.

My guess is that the Polished bone hoops are from
Chief Goonda the Ogre Shaman in W. Karana. Mid 30s
group? Maybe someone else can comment on this..

Belgarth

--- "Whitcraft,David" <DWHITCRAFT@...> wrote:
> From: "Whitcraft,David" <DWHITCRAFT@...>
>
> Bloodstained Mantle and Bloostained Tunic, both off
> the Undead Knight in
> Unrest? If so, what level party you need (I have
> heard prolly around 26-30?)
> to take him down? And how rare are the drops off
> him?
>
> Also, Polished Bone Hoops, same info needed. Level,
> zone, mob...etc...
>
> Thanks!
